titleStmt.title: Receipt for list of priests and for temple inventory

msContents.summary: A list of priests and a temple inventory have been sent and acknowledged

msItemStruct.note: Sourse of description: Recto with left part of 7 lines with the fibres; Verso blank
Related to P. Fouad 186-189 (ed. A. Bataille, Un nouveau dieu à Bacchias, Études de papyrologie, 4, 1938, p. 197-205)

supportDesc.support: Pap.; 5.8 x 10.8 cm; Wifstr. 10.5 x 5.5 cm

origin.origPlace: Bacchias, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: A list of priests and an inventory ... of Bacchias ... has been presented to ... of the meris of Herakleides of the Arsinoite nome ... Antoninus ..., Mesore the first. (Second hand): Through Sarapammon ...

listBibl.bibl: P. Bacch. 17 SB VI 9334 P. Lund. III 3 BL III 104; Wilcken, U., Archiv für Papyrusforschung 13 (1939) p. 233; Hombert, M., Chronique d'Égypt 14, 1939, p. 400-401; Schmidt, K. F. W., Philologische Wochenschrift (Jahrgang) 60 (No 45/48), 1940, c. 608-611; van Groningen, B. A., Museum, Maandblad voor Philologie en Geschiedenis, 47, 1940, c. 168; TM 14152 (relates to P.Lund. inv. 103, not to P.Lund. inv. 33)
